description: Do Not Modify. Generated by Event Schema Generator v1.0.15 on 2020-Oct-26 03:51:57

BEEventType.description: The sub type of the battery event as an enum value. e.g. charge, usage, over temp, low state of charge etc.

BEDateTime_Start.description: Units: DateTime in UTC. Date and Time in UTC of the start of this battery event.

BEStateOfChargeInitial.description: Units: Percent. Initial state of charge of Asset's/Truck's battery at the start of this battery event. A value of -1 indicates an error reading.

BMS_DCVoltage.description: Units: 0.0625 V/Bit. DC Voltage at the Asset's/Truck's battery terminal. A value of 65535 indicates an error reading.

BMS_DCCurrent.description: Units: 0.0625 A/Bit. DC Current at the Asset's/Truck's battery terminal. A value of -32768 indicates an error reading.

BMS_BatteryTemp.description: Units: 1 DegC/Bit. Temperature of Asset's/Truck's battery system. A value of -128 indicates an error reading.

BEDuration.description: Units: Seconds. Indicates the total duration of this battery event.

BMS_StateOfCharge.description: Units: Percent. Current state of charge of Asset's/Truck's battery. A value of -1 indicates an error reading.

BEAverageVoltage.description: Units: 0.0625 V/Bit. Average voltage of the Asset's/Truck's battery during this battery event.

BEAverageCurrentIn.description: Units: 0.0625 A/Bit. Average charge current delivered to the Asset's/Truck's battery during this battery event.

BEPeakCurrentIn.description: Units: 0.0625 A/Bit. Peak charge current delivered to the Asset's/Truck's battery during this battery event.

BEMinBatteryTemp.description: Units: 1 DegC/Bit. Minimum Temperature of Asset's/Truck's battery during the battery event. A value of -128 indicates an error reading.

BEPeakBatteryTemp.description: Units: 1 DegC/Bit. Peak Temperature of Asset's/Truck's battery during the battery event. A value of -128 indicates an error reading.

BEAverageBatteryTemp.description: Units: 1 DegC/Bit. Average Temperature of Asset's/Truck's battery during the battery event. A value of -128 indicates an error reading.

BatteryFull.description: Units: Boolean. When true indicates Asset's/Truck's battery is currently fully charged.

BEEnergyIn.description: Units: Wh. Indicates the total watt-hours delivered to the Asset's/Truck's battery during this battery event.

SessionId.description: Units: Count. A lifetime counter incremented on the start of a drive session. This ID uniquely defines a drive session for this telemetry device. The ID may be referenced by other events.

OperatorId.description: ID of operator currently logged onto the asset / telemetry device.
